AnalystsTest.Text:
3/12/2016 10:11:13 AM
Making people aware is important, but more important is to convert awareness into action. Clean India - Is attitude change more important than the movement?
Entrepreneures are not just born,can be created.It is an mind set can be develop.Our prime minister Narendra Modi hasbeen introduced MAKE IN INDIA concept and another one is youth skill programme on the occassion of youth skill day.If we took the above example of MODI. No one can start the business in the begining days of his life because he did not have any experience and capital.                                                                                                                                                                                                                 Last year modi has introduced STARTUP INDIA STANDUP INDIA  on the occasion of Aug15,2015.And another main thoutht that our P.M launched the on the day of  youth skill day,he introduced to encourage the  youth,people and un employement candidates.this scheame gives the loan strating from 5000 to 1,50,000.Who ever had the technical skills,mission,vission,goals and future forecasting plans with the clean idea government can gives the loans to the eligible persons.And the main thing he sactioned the 10000 I.T.I in our country.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   The main aim of introducing those concepts if no one can no about the uses of those technics how it is possible.So that is the reason Modi launched the some new concepts.I agree with the above point making people is important ,but more important is to convert awareness in to action. Dehli C.M ARAVIND KEJRIWHALL strictly introduced the ODD EVEN NUMBER policy. To reduce the pollution in the Dehli.Because of all over world dehli has top10 polluted metro cities.Introducing  of this policy pollution hasbeen decreased alot.But some of the technichal problem this policy have stopped.This policy may have starts in the month of april.This policy has given the some excemptions to the emergency services and as well as government vechichles and C.N.G related vechicles.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Before the pre independence of India every one can did their caste based and religion  based works only.In gujarath many people depends on the mannual works,For example vysyas and jains.After the post independence Indian government has introduced industrial regulation act in1948.After the independence many changes occurein  people income,wages,tastes,styles.So peole tried to produce the maximum outputs within the short period of time. So Many people as much as like to adopt the new technics in the organizations as well as  thier personel lifes also.chaina has introduced the liberalization policy in 1961, but india has introduced these policy in 1963.After the liberalization policy many changes havebeen occured.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               Is attitude more impotant than the movement.I Aree with that point because of now a days many people likes  to change thier mission,vision,technics,in thier routine life styles.Comming to the entrepreneurs point of you they have more knowledge and innovative,futuresight,risk taking ,adoptability.But they dont have money to strats a new business.If they show the attitude towards thier business government can provide the loans to the interested persons.If they dont have attitude towards the business plan they didnt perform well in the future.
